text: Na babandi (indyarya) bubatse umusigiti bagamije kugirira nabi (abemera), guhakana (Allah), no gucamo ibice abemera, gutegerereza (bakanawugira)aho uwarwanya Allah n'Intumwa ye mbere (y’uko wubakwa), rwose bazarahira ko nta kindi bari bagambiriye kitari ibyiza. Kandi Allah ahamya ko mu by’ukuri ari abanyabinyoma
